subject: Economics
title: The Future of Economics: What Comes Next?
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Future of Economics: What Comes Next?.

hook.text: Economics failed to predict 2008. Climate change defies its models. AI is transforming labor.

buildup.text: New economics integrates psychology, ecology, network science, and computation.

discovery.text: Kate Raworth's 'Doughnut Economics' proposes a new goal: meet human needs without overshooting planetary boundaries.

twist.text: AI can now process economic data that no human team could analyze.

climax.text: The next great economist might not be a person at all.

punchline.text: Economics keeps evolving because the economy never stops changing.

quiz.question: How is economics evolving in the 21st century?
options: Integrating psychology, ecology, AI, and network science to move beyond rational-agent models
